name: Yakima County Health District COVID Vaccination Site
info: ***2nd DOSE PFIZER VACCINATIONS!!!!***!!!!VACUNAS DE SEGUNDA DOSIS PFIZER!!! The vaccination clinic will take place at Fiesta Foods in Sunnyside. Masks are required. Please wear clothing which allows access to your shoulder. Vaccinations at this site are reserved for people who live and/or work in Washington State. All individuals 12 and over are eligible to get vaccinated. Those under 18 must be accompanied by a parent/guardian or must get parental consent via video/phone call or paper format. La clínica de vacunación se ubicará en Fiesta Foods de Sunnyside. Se requieren máscaras. Por favor, use ropa que permita acceso a su brazo. Las vacunas en este sitio están reservadas para las personas que viven o trabajan en el estado de Washington. Todas las personas mayores de 12 años son elegibles para vacunarse. Los menores de 18 años deben estar acompañados por un padre/tutor o deben obtener el consentimiento de los padres por video/llamada telefónica o en papel. ***2nd DOSE PFIZER VACCINATIONS!!!!***!!!!VACUNAS DE SEGUNDA DOSIS PFIZER!!!
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Care-A-Van Pasco Flea Market
vaccines: Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine, Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine
info: This clinic is located at Pasco Flea Market. ****This is a JOHNSON & JOHNSON single dose, Pfizer 1st/2nd dose Clinic and is by appointment or walk in.  Please note: Pfizer has been authorized for ages 12 – 17 with parental authorization. Johnson & Johnson is authorized for patients over the age of 18. This is a walk-up location. Please let us know if you or someone you are accompanying needs assistance of any kind. **You should also plan your visit around waiting for 15 minutes in the observation area so we can monitor for any unlikely adverse reactions to the vaccine.** Certain people with pre-identified conditions or past anaphylaxis events may be asked to wait for 30 minutes of observation. Free language translation services are provided. Video ASL translation is also provided. Please do not come if you are feeling ill.  It is best to wear clothes that will allow for access to your upper arm, just below the shoulder. **Masks are still required. If you do not have a mask, one will be provided.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Thurston County Public Health Medical Reserve Corp
address: Scatter Creek Rest Stop - Northbound I-5, Rochester WA, 98579
info: This is a single-dose Johnson & Johnson clinic being held at the Scatter Creek Rest Area on Northbound I-5 outside of Rochester, WA, 98579 for anyone age 18 and older from 3pm-7pm. Please bring a form of identification with you to your appointment - ID card, passport, or other document with your name and birthday on it. • Wear a short-sleeved shirt, but dress with layers, if needed. •  Waiting at least 15 minutes after vaccination is required.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Yakima Community Vaccine Center
info: ***PFIZER VACCINATIONS*** !!!!VACUNAS DE PFIZER!!! Enter fairgrounds through Gate 15 off of Pacific Avenue. Be prepared to show confirmation of your appointment or you may experience a slightly longer wait. Masks are required. Please wear clothing which allows access to your shoulder. Vaccinations at this site are reserved for people who live and/or work in Washington State. All Minors age 17 and Under must be accompanied by a parent. Ingresar por la puerta 15 en la avenida Pacífico. Se requieren máscaras. Por favor, use ropa que permita acceso a su brazo. Las vacunas en este sitio están reservadas para las personas que viven o trabajan en el estado de Washington. Todos los menores de 17 años o menos deben ir con su padres.*** PFIZER VACCINATIONS*** !!!!VACUNAS DE PFIZER!!!
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Thurston County Public Health Medical Reserve Corp
address: Yauger Park - 3100 Capital Mall Drive SW, Olympia WA, 98502
info: This is a Pfizer vaccination event for anyone age 12 and older. • This is a walk-up clinic at Yauger Park located at 3100 Capital Mall Dr SW, Olympia, WA 98502. The clinic is from 10am - 1pm. • All minors 12 to 17 years old must receive parent or guardian consent to receive a COVID-19 vaccine. This must be done in PrepMod when registering for an appointment. Parents or guardians do not have to be present at the time of vaccination if they signed the consent form online during registration. • Please bring a form of identification with you to your appointment - ID card, passport, or other document with your name and birthday on it. • Wear a short-sleeved shirt, but dress with layers if necessary. • Waiting at least 15 minutes after vaccination is required.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Bird's Eye Medical COVID Vaccine Site
vaccines: Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine, Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine
info: This clinic is located at Holy Cross Catholic Church. We are offering single doses of the Johnson & Johnson vaccine as well as first or second doses of the Pfizer vaccine. You must be at least 18 years old to get the Johnson & Johnson vaccine or at least 12 years old to get the Pfizer vaccine.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.
